article_title: Chaffetz accuses HHS of resisting CO-OP document subpoena
article_text:
Jim Esquea (House Oversight hearing screen capture)

Rep. Jason Chaffetz, R-Utah, the chairman of the House Oversight and Government Reform, today blasted the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) for failing to provide documents the committee had requested through letters as well as a subpoena.

See also: GOP: We need PPACA cost-reduction subsidy information

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: Providing private access to the documents is not the same as providing the documents, Chaffetz says.

og.description: Providing private access to the documents is not the same as providing the documents, Chaffetz says.

article_summary:
Jim Esquea (House Oversight hearing screen capture)Rep. Jason Chaffetz, R-Utah, the chairman of the House Oversight and Government Reform, today blasted the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) for failing to provide documents the committee had requested through letters as well as a subpoena.
See also: GOP: We need PPACA cost-reduction subsidy information
